src:
Tommy Terhenti di Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019
06 Nov 2019, 15:28 by Danang Sundoro



Tommy Terhenti di Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019



Tommy Terhenti di Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou : Pebulutangkis tunggal putra Indonesia Tommy Sugiarto terhenti langkahnya saat menghadapi Sai Praneeth asal India di babak pertama turnamen Fuzhou China Open 2019 dengan tiga game 21-15, 12-21, 10-21 dalam tempo 52 menit di Haixia, Olympic Sports Center, Rabu (6/11/2019) sore.“Di game pertama saya main lebih safe dan nggak banyak mati sendiri. Beda dengan di game kedua dan ketiga. Saya merasa kurang fokus dan pertahanan saya kurang rapat. Saya malah banyak membuka peluang bagi Sai,” kata Tommy usai laga dalam keterangan kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Rabu (6/11/2019).“Saya tidak bisa menerapkan permainan seperti di game pertama. Saat tertinggal di game kedua pun saya terbawa irama permainan lawan,” ujar Tommy. “Performa saya masih naik-turun karena latihan saya memang nggak seintensif dulu di pelatnas. Memang ini tantangannya menjadi pemain profesional,” lanjutnya. BACA JUGA : Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan/Melati Melaju ke Babak KeduaTurnamen berkategori 750, Fuzhou China Open 2019 akan menjadi turnamen terakhir Tommy di tahun ini. Hal itu, karena putra dari Icuk Sugiarto itu tidak akan mengikuti turnamen Hong Kong Open 2019, pekan depan.  “Dari awal memang plan-nya nggak ikut ke Hong Kong Open, setelah ini saya akan langsung pulang ke Jakarta, rehat sebentar dan menyusun rencana turnamen untuk tahun depan,” tegas Tommy.BACA JUGA :Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Hafiz/Gloria Terhenti Di Hari Kedua, Dihadang TiongkokDua tunggal putra Indonesia sudah terhenti di turnamen ini. Sebelumnya, Anthony Sinisuka Ginting juga harus angkat koper lebih awal setelah dikalahkan Ng Ka Long Angus (Hong Kong), dengan skor 18-21, 9-21. Sedangkan dua wakil lagi akan saling berhadapan satu sama lain, Jonatan Christie akan bertemu dengan Shesar Hiren Rhustavito di babak pertama, Rabu (6/11/2019) Sore.
text:
Tommy Stopped at Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019
Nov 6 2019, 15:28 by Danang Sundoro



Tommy Stopped at Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019



Tommy Stopped at Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian men's singles player Tommy Sugiarto stopped his path when facing Indian Sai Praneeth in the first round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 tournament with three games 21-15, 12-21, 10-21 in 52 minutes in Haixia, Olympic Sports Center , Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon. "In the first game I played safer and didn't die a lot myself. Unlike in the second and third game. I feel less focused and my defense is not tight. I even opened up many opportunities for Sai, "said Tommy after the match in a statement to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Wednesday (11/06/2019)." I could not implement the game like in the first game. When I was left in the second game I was carried away by the opponent's rhythm, "said Tommy. "My performance is still fluctuating because my training was not as intensive as before in the national training. Indeed, the challenge is to become a professional player, "he continued. READ ALSO: Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan / Melati Advancing to the Second Round Tournament in category 750, Fuzhou China Open 2019 will be Tommy's last tournament this year. That is because the son of Icuk Sugiarto will not participate in the 2019 Hong Kong Open tournament next week. "From the start, the plan did not go to the Hong Kong Open, after this I will go straight back to Jakarta, take a break and arrange tournament plans for next year," said Tommy. READ ALSO: Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Hafiz / Gloria Stalled On Day Two, Blocked by China Two Indonesian men's singles had stopped at this tournament. Previously, Anthony Sinisuka Ginting also had to lift a suitcase earlier after being defeated by Ng Ka Long Angus (Hong Kong), with a score of 18-21, 9-21. While two more representatives will face each other, Jonatan Christie will meet with Shesar Hiren Rhustavito in the first round, Wednesday (11/06/2019) Afternoon.
